location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Thomas H Sheridan, Acting Public Secretary at Tauris to Lieutenant William Bruce, Acting Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter from Thomas H Sheridan, Acting Public Secretary at Tauris [Tabriz, Iran] to Lieut. William Bruce, Acting Resident at Bushire, enclosing a packet from Sir Harford Jones to the President in Council at Bombay, to be delivered with urgency.
